text: Hi, I would like to create automatic email (purchase confirmation etc) related to an ecommerce. The ecommerce is built on magento and I would like to know if custom workflow is the right tool to develop the automatic email functionality

Trigger can be set to pretty much anything - e.g. if Magento provides invoices and you can integrate these via stripe to HubSpot for example, you can then trigger off of that. Or you could have a trigger based on the user viewing a page (like an order confirmation page shown after checkout). Tons of options.
